segments.text: No , I am not eating there anymore . I have ordered my favorite food in the restaurant around the corner . The food served in the cafeteria is not my type . I am a total meat lover . But the cafeteria is doing its best to force me to be a vegetarian . They have been serving the Chinese cabbage and white gorse for three days . Haven ’ t you noticed that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s fine with me . I don ’ t hate vegetables and I don ’ t eat much during lunch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , then the cafeteria suits you best . But anyway , if you like to have a lunch outside the company , feel free to join me anytime .
segments.speaker: S2
